game.minopp.play.no_player: You're not a part of the game.
game.minopp.play.no_enough_player: Not enough participants to start the game.
game.minopp.play.must_draw: You must draw a card right now.
game.minopp.play.invalid_card: This card doesn't apply to the top card.
game.minopp.play.no_draw: You can't draw a card right now.
game.minopp.play.rule_forbid: You can only play this card when you have no other cards to play.
game.minopp.play.table_in_demo: This table is only for demonstration and doesn't host games.
game.minopp.play.hand_card_in_inventory: Since your main hand is occupied, a hand card item has been placed in your inventory. Please move it to your main hand.
game.minopp.play.seats_reset: %1$s reset the seats. Please reallocate seats.
game.minopp.play.deck_depleted: You have somehow drew the entire deck onto your hands. The game now ends.
game.minopp.play.player_unavailable: Player %1$s is not available. Please reallocate seats.
game.minopp.play.mino_shout_invalid: %1$s got penalized for randomly shouting Mino.
game.minopp.play.doubt_success: %1$s pointed out that %2$s forgot to shout Mino.
game.minopp.play.doubt_target_hand: They still have more than one cards in hand.
gui.minopp.wild_selection.title: Select a color
gui.minopp.play.start_hint: Stand beside the table and right-click to join.
gui.minopp.play.discard_hand: It's your turn! Please play a card.
gui.minopp.play.discard_drawn: You have drawn card(s). Please play it.
gui.minopp.seats.title: Participants Seated on the Table
gui.minopp.bot_config.title: MinoBot Preferences
gui.minopp.bot_config.skin.summary: Name or UUID of the player whose skin is to be used.
gui.minopp.bot_config.no_push.summary: Prevent the bot from being moved by other players by pushing.
gui.minopp.bot_config.no_win.summary: If the bot should never play its last card.
gui.minopp.bot_config.no_player_draw.sum: If the bot should avoid playing Draw cards when the next player is a human player.
gui.minopp.bot_config.forget_chance.summ: Chance of the bot forgetting to shout 'Mino' according to the rule.
gui.minopp.bot_config.start_game.summary: If the bot should automatically propose starting the game when enough players are seated.
gui.minopp.bot_config.yacl_missing: YetAnotherConfigLib is required to show the configuration screen. Please install it and then try again.
